import math
t=int(raw_input())
for i in xrange(0,t):
	st=raw_input().split()
	list1=[]
	for j in xrange(0,11):
	   	list1.append(int(st[j]))
	list1.sort()
	k=int(raw_input())
	c=list1.count(list1[-1*k])
	count=0
	for j in xrange(0,11):
		if list1[-1*k+j]!=list1[-1*k] or -1*k+j==0:
		    break
		count+=1    
	print math.factorial(c)/(math.factorial(c-count)*math.factorial(count))
